User

A user in the system.

Field Type Description Required Default
id int Unique identifier for the user Yes PydanticUndefined
username str User's login name Yes PydanticUndefined
email str User's email address Yes PydanticUndefined
full_name Optional[str] User's full name Yes -
age Optional[int] User's age in years Yes -
tags List[str] List of user tags Yes list()
car Optional[Car] User's car details Yes -

Car

Details about a car.

Field Type Description Required Default
make str The manufacturer of the car Yes PydanticUndefined
price int The price of the car in dollars Yes PydanticUndefined
